markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Vine Whip](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1889)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 38 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)_ is crafted from the vine of a dangerous plant creature. It deals bludgeoning or slashing damage, according to the vine attack of the creature it was harvested from. For example, collecting a vine from an [assassin vine](/Monsters.aspx?ID=555) would result in a _vine whip_ that deals bludgeoning damage, while one from a [mandragora](/Monsters.aspx?ID=727) or [viper vine](/Monsters.aspx?ID=854) would deal piercing damage.

<document level="2" id="action-1583" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include the vine from a plant creature with a vine attack.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Vine Whip
